description: GRANT: - 2 Accessible Parking Bay fixed dot signs 7m (h) x 2.8m (w) constructed from an aluminum panel with digitally printed vinyl graphics (sign type 24), 1 Guiding Gateway maximum vehicle height signage (sign type 3), 2 Pre-Sell signage boards 2.4m (h) x 0.8m (w) (sign type 7), 1 DT Lane Canopy Advertisement ("Order Here") (sign type 8), 1 Order Bay fixed dot sign 7m (h) x 2.8m (w) constructed from an aluminum panel with digitally printed vinyl graphics (sign type 24), 1 Parked Order Bay 1 fixed dot sign 7m (h) x 2.8m (w) constructed from an aluminum panel with digitally printed vinyl graphics (sign type 24), 1 Parked Order Bay 2 fixed dot sign 7m (h) x 2.8m (w) constructed from an aluminum panel with digitally printed vinyl graphics (sign type 24). REFUSE:- 1 Entrance Totem sign 1.2m (h) x 0.35m (w) manufactured in metal panels, coloured dark green, dark grey, and white (drawing no. 0426-06-P216 rev c), 1 Pre-Sell signage boards 2.4m (h) x 0.8m (w) (sign type 7), 1 triple sided Menu Board 2.74M (w) x 2.51m (h) (sign type 10, 11, 12), 1 Poster Board (sign type 13), I directional Totem sign 2.1m (h) x 0.6m (w) (sign type 2) (SPLIT DECISION)
